episodes.title: Children of God | Documentary | BBC Select
episodes.description:
For 18 years, Sylvia Padilla and her children lived within the controversial cult known as Children of God. After Sylvia fled the group, allegations of sexual and financial exploitation were made. But this global organization denies the allegations and still flourishes to this day.

This gripping documentary about the Children of God cult on BBC Select explores its story to try and discover what really took place.

Stream Children of God with BBC Select in the US: https://bit.ly/3X49P1I and Canada:  https://bit.ly/3TGQPmT

episodes.title: Was Andrew Cohen's EnlightenNext Group A Cult?  | How I Created A Cult | BBC Select
episodes.description:
Why exactly was the EnlightenNext organization started by spiritual leader, Andrew Cohen? Was it a really a cover for a cult? Stream the full documentary, How I Created a Cult on BBC Select.

BBC Select is a new documentary streaming channel available in the U.S and Canada. Find out more and start your free trial: https://bit.ly/3kwM3bU

episodes.title: Treated Like a God | How I Created a Cult | BBC Select
episodes.description:
Andrew Cohen now had a devoted group of followers. But his determination to test their faith soon grew more and more destructive. His devotees reported psychological abuse, including simulated amputations, while others were forced to remain in freezing cold water to the point of hypothermia as punishment. Why were these ordinary people so willing to suffer these extremes to please one man?

BBC Select is a new documentary streaming channel available in the U.S and Canada. Find out more and start your free trial: https://bit.ly/3kwM3bU
